svg.text: title: "October 5, 2018" date: "2018-10-05"

Stuff for developers

You can now run your own Connext payment channel hub

* Ropsten testnet will now implement the Constantinople fork on block 4.23m in about 4
days

part 2

* Mustekala : Ethereum chain data available via light client p2p network

and Awesome Eth Security reference

Awesome Eth Security reference
Live on mainnet
* dYdX launches Eth short on main net
Ecosystem
* Introducing .luxe, natively enabled on ENS
Introducing .luxe, natively enabled on ENS
* How RAC imagines Ethereum will reshape the music industry
How RAC imagines Ethereum will reshape the music industry
* Moloch DAO , an experiment to get projects to coordinate around funding Eth
infrastructure
Moloch DAO , an experiment to get projects to coordinate around funding Eth
* Enterprise Ethereum Alliance and Hyperledger join each other’s group as associate
members. Because as Bob Summerwill always says, “ EEA is a standards body. Hyperledger
is an umbrella for open source blockchain projects .”
Enterprise Ethereum Alliance and Hyperledger join each other’s group as associate
* Blockchain Gaming Alliance to develop best practices and standards
Blockchain Gaming Alliance to develop best practices and standards
Governance and Standards
* EIP1459 : Node discovery via DNS
EIP1459 : Node discovery via DNS
* ERC1462 : basic security token
ERC1462 : basic security token
* ERC1470 : smart contract weakness classification
ERC1470 : smart contract weakness classification
* Vlad Zamfir: Blockchain Governance 101 , his call to think about how we want which of
5 governance scenarios we prefer. He followed up with his declaration to fight against
3 of the 5 , though it was relatively clear after the first article.
Vlad Zamfir: Blockchain Governance 101 , his call to think about how we want which of 5
governance scenarios we prefer. He followed up with his declaration to fight against 3
of the 5 , though it was relatively clear after the first article.
Project Updates
* Numerai announces Erasure Protocol using NMR , a “p2p, decentralized data marketplace
for predictions.” Create a track record of predictions that people can buy but you can
get slashed if they’re wrong.
Numerai announces Erasure Protocol using NMR , a “p2p, decentralized data marketplace
* Spankchain’s stable USDtoken BOOTY (collateralized using its native token) goes live
today .
Spankchain’s stable USDtoken BOOTY (collateralized using its native token) goes live
* OMG community update
OMG community update
* Streamr’s retrospective on building their data marketplace
Streamr’s retrospective on building their data marketplace
* What’s coming in Augur v2 . Also topical index funds , eg Lebron James
What’s coming in Augur v2 . Also topical index funds , eg Lebron James
* Gnosis DutchX code is deployed and pilot to begin. Also: GnosisX had zero possible
winners submitted , so what they’re going to do now to encourage #buidl
Gnosis DutchX code is deployed and pilot to begin. Also: GnosisX had zero possible

If you appreciate this newsletter, thank ConsenSys
This newsletter is made possible by ConsenSys , which is perpetually hiring if you’re
interested.
I own Week In Ethereum. As such, editorial control has always been 100% me. If you’re
unhappy with editorial decisions, feel free to tweet at me.
Shameless self-promotion
Most of what I link to I tweet first: @evan_van_ness
Week in Ethereum News
